gospel.text:
[[Lc 12,49]]Jesus said to his disciples: â€œI have come to set the earth on fire, and how I wish it were already blazing!
[[Lc 12,50]]There is a baptism with which I must be baptized, and how great is my anguish until it is accomplished!
[[Lc 12,51]]Do you think that I have come to establish peace on the earth? No, I tell you, but rather division.
[[Lc 12,52]]From now on a household of five will be divided, three against two and two against three;
[[Lc 12,53]]a father will be divided against his son and a son against his father, a mother against her daughter and a daughter against her mother, a mother-in-law against her daughter-in-law and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law."
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke

first_reading.text:
[[Ep 3,14]]Brothers and sisters: I kneel before the Father,
[[Ep 3,15]]from whom every family in heaven and on earth is named,
[[Ep 3,16]]that he may grant you in accord with the riches of his glory to be strengthened with power through his Spirit in the inner self,
[[Ep 3,17]]and that Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith; that you, rooted and grounded in love,
[[Ep 3,18]]may have strength to comprehend with all the holy ones what is the breadth and length and height and depth,
[[Ep 3,19]]and to know the love of Christ that surpasses knowledge, so that you may be filled with all the fullness of God.
[[Ep 3,20]]Now to him who is able to accomplish far more than all we ask or imagine, by the power at work within us,
[[Ep 3,21]]to him be glory in the church and in Christ Jesus to all generations, forever and ever. Amen.
first_reading.title: Letter to the Ephesians

psalm.text:
[[Ps 33,1]]Exult, you just, in the LORD; 
Praise from the upright is fitting.
[[Ps 33,2]]Give thanks to the LORD on the harp; 
With the ten stringed lyre chant his praises

[[Ps 33,4]]For upright is the word of the LORD, 
and all his works are trustworthy.
[[Ps 33,5]]He loves justice and right; 
of the kindness of the LORD the earth is full.

[[Ps 33,11]]But the plan of the LORD stands forever; 
The design of his heart, through all generations.
[[Ps 33,12]]Blessed the nation whose God is the LORD, 
the people he has chosen for his own inheritance.

[[Ps 33,18]]See, the eyes of the LORD are upon those who fear him, 
upon those who hope for his kindness,
[[Ps 33,19]]To deliver them from death 
and preserve them in spite of famine.
psalm.title: Psalms
